subject: Re: [junit] about junit plugin
msgSnippet: Ahmed, For a great overview of how a JUnit-like plug-in would work, see the book Contributing to Eclipse by Beck and Gamma. David Saff
messageBody:
Ahmed,

For a great overview of how a JUnit-like plug-in would work, see the
book Contributing to Eclipse by Beck and Gamma.

David Saff
